shadcn.import: import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableFooter, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell, TableCaption } from '@/components/ui/table'

Table.Root.description: Renders <table> with full HTML table props

Table.Header.description: Renders <thead> with full HTML thead props

Table.Body.description: Renders <tbody> with full HTML tbody props

Table.Footer.description: Renders <tfoot> with full HTML tfoot props

Table.Row.description: Renders <tr> with full HTML tr props

Table.Head.description: Renders <th> with full HTML th props

Table.Cell.description: Renders <td> with full HTML td props

Table.Caption.description: Renders <caption> with full HTML caption props

notes: Both use native HTML table elements (table, thead, tbody, tr, th, td, caption).
vlting Table uses native HTML elements directly (not Tamagui styled views) for proper table layout context.
Styling uses CSS custom properties mapping to Tamagui theme tokens via inline styles.
Both have nearly identical compound APIs with the same sub-component names.
All sub-components accept their respective HTML element props and a style override.
